SEARCH

Class settingsController

java.lang.Object
settingsController
public class settingsController extends Object
Controller class for the settings screen.

settingsController manages the functionality of the settings screen, including adjusting sound and music volumes and navigating back to the main menu.

Version:
1.4
Author:
Arleen Hayer

    • handleBackButton

      public void handleBackButton() throws MultimediaException, UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Handles the back button press to navigate back to the main menu.
      Throws:
      MultimediaException - if there's an error with multimedia playback.
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio file format is unsupported.
      IOException - if there's an I/O error.
      LineUnavailableException - if a line cannot be opened.
